body: @Gojii i come to answer a tad late but: her* the artist is a female, and yeah, the other games do have translations, the second game's is sadly just a very bad MTL, dunno if vndb has it listed or not so cant really blame anyone if they didnt knew given that its was basically "muh secrit project" from 4chan, but we should be close to an ENG release for it(and also the announcement of their 4th game), there's people working on a manual MTL of the 3rd game too(same one from the Comic) but no word on when it'll be released either, but it'll most likely be added to the game's vndb once its done

Gotten a couple of his VNs on dlsite sales. Worth it, but I havent seen any proper TLs of the rest of them floating around, at least not the last time I checked the usual places. You'd think there would be when even hgames/VNs with.... slightly lower quality artwork (that's being absurdly generous in many cases) have them or at least a MTL. Might just need to lurk moar and will realize I'm retarded and theres been a eng patch for them someone made the whole time.
@abajojo just play the visual novel one instead. The artist actually do work on it
Yeah @kcjpunk. Not this one. This one is lit.
Wish this was a full story
Grailm, they have released one of those VN on Steam officially in English, uncensored. Smaller boobs though
@haxmo One of them got translated not that long ago tho?
Definitely. Let's see some translations of these vn's.
I'd buy this VN if it was translated in a heartbeat.
Holy shit this art is so fucking erotic, especially that COMIC BAVEL cover page (page 4). Just looking at it makes you wanna sink yourself on those mega-sized boobs.
